Welcome to SwingPad!

This will install and setup SwingPad, an exploratory tool for SwingBuilder and its siblings:
  • SwingXBuilder
  • JideBuilder
  • FlamingoBuilder
  • SwingxtrasBuilder
  • TrayBuilder
Enjoy prototyping Swing views with SwingPad!

Griffon Groovy

About this Distribution

This installer was created using IzPack (see http://izpack.org/).
